snippet: The longtime coach of the San Antonio Spurs, Gregg Popovich, and the team’s veteran star, Tim Duncan, have formed a unique partnership in the N.B.A. over the past 15 years.
abstract: Longtime San Antonio Spurs coach Gregg Popovich and the team’s veteran star Tim Duncan have formed a unique partnership in the NBA over the past 15 years.
lead_paragraph: The longtime coach of the San Antonio Spurs, Gregg Popovich, and the team’s veteran star, Tim Duncan, have formed a unique partnership in the N.B.A. over the past 15 years.

headline.seo: In San Antonio, Duncan and Popovich Work Well Together
headline.main: In San Antonio, a Coach’s Player, a Player’s Coach
headline.print_headline: In San Antonio, A Coach’s Player, A Player’s Coach
